review: The reason for 4 (four) stars is the instant billing, if you're not clear for each contract per APP.  Hopefully most people are cautious!I like the ease of installation and the quality of this little device 5 (five) stars!!!I opted for the voice remote, it should be standard.

review: great deal for the price. Since I have Prime I wanted to take full advantage of the service and this made it easy.
author: kacey

review: Works very well. Lacking in apps but what it has works without any problems. Would be nice if in the near future Vudu or another UltraViolet app would be made available so those of us with with movie collections in the Cloud could access them without having to have another device hooked up as well. Overall it is great. Does what it is supposed to do just needs a few tweaks to put it on the same level as Roku.

review: It was easy to install, even for a non-techy like me

review: Buffing is constantly interrupted. I continuously get a message stating no internet connection but when I go to set to settings it shows I'm connected. When buffing is not interrupted, it's great. The frustration is more often than the enjoyment.

review: Easy to set up and use. I will be buying one more.
author: cate

review: A cheap easy way to watch amazon prime on your TV. It also plays Netflix, showtime, hulu plus, Pandora,and others. I also have a chromecast but like the fire TV stick better because of the remote for the fire tv. It is nice not to need to use your phone as a remote. You cannot stream content from your computer to the fire tv stick like you can with the chromecast. I now use the fire tv stick almost exclusively.
author: Samantha M.
